room_title: Escape room "The Bomb Squad" by ASDF Escape in New Brunswick
review: The Bomb Squad would be a good experience for beginners, but the website looks way more professional than the place actually is. It’s basically a big room with little rooms run by college students.The staff was nice and the puzzles were doable, but if you’ve done an escape room before this will probably not be very fun.

room_title: Escape room "The Bomb Squad" by ASDF Escape in New Brunswick
review: Rip off of original NYC escape room. All it is is number puzzles not as creative as original.

room_title: Escape room "The Bomb Squad" by ASDF Escape in New Brunswick
review: We did the Bomb Squad. I walked into a drab room looking around confused; wondering how to start. Once we caught on, we had a ball! And yes, I plan on trying another room.

room_title: Escape room "The Bomb Squad" by ASDF Escape in New Brunswick
review: We were the BOMB SQUAD! Our family and friends spent a phenomenal time brainstorming how to escape before the bomb blew! Phineas and Joanna were friendly, helpful and energetic. Great place for group fun!. Check it out.

room_title: Escape room "The Bomb Squad" by ASDF Escape in New Brunswick
review: I had a great time, the staff was amazing and we had an amazing time trying to escape. We made it just in time!
